title: Creation

source:
ctx.a = new Vec2(3, 4)
ctx.b = new Vec2(1, 2)

title: Addition
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a + b:', ctx.a.clone().add(ctx.b))

title: Subtraction
source:
logger.log('a:', ctx.a)
logger.log('b:', ctx.b)
logger.log('a - b:', ctx.a.clone().sub(ctx.b))

title: Distance
source:
const other = new Vec2(0, 0)
logger.log('v:', ctx.v)
logger.log('other:', other)
logger.log('distance:', ctx.v.distanceTo(other))

title: Rotation
Lerp
source:
const a = new Vec2(0, 0)
const b = new Vec2(10, 10)
logger.log('a:', a)
logger.log('b:', b)
logger.log('25%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.25))
logger.log('50%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.5))
logger.log('75%:', a.clone().lerp(b, 0.75))

title: Example
source:
const result = new Vec2(1, 0)
    .multiplyScalar(5)
    .add(new Vec2(0, 3))
    .normalize()
logger.log('result:', result)
